genresAdvancedInfo.name: ukrainian choir
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Ukrainian choir music is a traditional form of vocal music that has been a part of Ukrainian culture for centuries. It is characterized by its use of multi-part harmonies and a cappella singing, often featuring complex vocal arrangements and intricate melodies. Ukrainian choir music is often performed at religious and cultural events, and is considered an important part of the country's cultural heritage. Some notable Ukrainian choir ensembles include the National Academic Choir of Ukraine and the Kyiv Chamber Choir.
